summary: Completed frontend testing of onboarding layout consistency and Compare Plans modal redesign. All 4 onboarding pages now use consistent wide layout (max-w-5xl) with centered titles and icons. Compare modal redesigned with gradient header, BEST VALUE badge on Gold, highlighted Gold column, rounded check/cross icons, and bottom CTA section.

ui_bugs.issue: Minor element detachment errors during rapid navigation between onboarding pages
ui_bugs.note: React state update timing issue, doesn't affect core functionality

passed_tests: Choose Plan page uses wide layout with centered title and icon
Store Details page has wide layout matching Choose Plan design
Store Details form card centered within max-w-2xl wrapper
Store Details Back button navigates to Choose Plan
Store Details Continue navigates to Connect Marketplace
Connect Marketplace has wide layout with centered title and icon
Connect Marketplace grid shows 5 cards in row on desktop (lg:grid-cols-5)
Connect Marketplace connection panel opens centered (max-w-2xl)
Connect Marketplace Back navigates to Store Details
Connect Marketplace Continue navigates to Review
Review page has wide layout with centered title and icon
Review summary cards centered within max-w-2xl wrapper
Review plan summary shows Gold badge and price
Review Change plan link navigates to Choose Plan
Review Start Sync button clickable
Compare Plans modal opens with rich redesign
Compare modal has gradient header with plan icons
Compare modal shows BEST VALUE badge on Gold column
Compare modal Gold column highlighted throughout (10+ cells)
Compare modal check/cross icons in rounded circles (16 found)
Compare modal has bottom CTA section with 'Choose a plan' button
Compare modal close button works
All 4 onboarding pages show consistent Step X of 4 counter
